name: ByteDex
description: ByteDex is an ecosytem including Byte Cryptocurrency wallet, Non-custodial Byte Exchange and Byte Swap platform for secure cryptocurrency trading, a blockchain solution to decentralize the Exchange activities named Byte Chain, BEXT token as an ecosystem utility token and ByteDex communities. BEXT Token is mainly used for; - To reward Exchange and ecosystem users - To circulate ecosystem tokenomics - To collect fees and payments from users - Participation of ByteDex community on ecosytem management Byte Exchange: Byte Exchange is designed as a non-custodial Exchange to secure cryptocurrency trading with rich features. Byte Wallet: Byte Wallet is a non-custodial cryptocurrency wallet that users can be able to connect Byte Exchange for trading BEXT Token: Bext token is the main unit of the ByteDex in TRC-20, ERC-20, BEP-20 format ByteChain: Proposed blockchain with a dual layer system to decentralize Exchange transactions and open lock of DeFi features on ByteDex Ecosystem ByteDex Communities: ByteDex is an community driven ecosystem aims to create ByteDex communities all around the globe. Community elections will be held according to minimum participant number in the countries.
